content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ there s nothing quite like the charm of a handmade stocking hanging by the fireplace ready to be filled with holiday cheer the **festive wheat stitch™ crochet stocking** pattern brings that magic to your home this pattern features two versatile sizes making it perfect for all your holiday decor needs with its elegant mock-cable texture created using puff stitches and the wheat stitch™ pattern this stocking is as cozy as it is beautiful worked in row for the body and seamlessly joined finished with a toe and heel worked in the round for a polished look plus the included **video tutorial** 1 ensures you ll have all the guidance you need to create this timeless piece crochet hook g+/7 4 5mm - or size to meet gauge 2 notions removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 rivets 6 burlap ribbon 7 wooden tags 8 yarn brava worsted 9 100 % premium acrylic 218yds/100g or lion brand color theory 10 100% acrylic 246yds/100g yardage small large 230 250 yds 1 2 balls yarn substitutions mighty stitch worsted 11 80% acrylic 20% superwash wool 208yds/100g mary maxim starlette worsted 12 100% ultra soft acrylic 180yds/100g brava tweed worsted 13 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/100g herrschners worsted 8 heathers 14 100% acrylic 489yds/226g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet 2 together rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side gauge 15 sts x 13 row = 4 x4 in stitch pattern repeat not blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 15 two sizes small large skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 16 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 17 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 18 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak 19 / pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 20 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 21 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used
